医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
人工智能驱动的工具可以减轻医疗保健领域护士的工作量在许多国家，社会福利部门正面临巨大的成本削减压力、劳动力短缺和对其服务不断增长的需求。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250123/AI-driven-tools-could-ease-nursese28099-workload-in-healthcare-sector.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250123/AI-driven-tools-could-ease-nursese28099-workload-in-healthcare-sector.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9c14d204-a37f-4dcc-99af-558c443fa7ef Thu, 23 Jan 2025 08:29:00 -0500 AI-driven tools could ease nurses’ workload in healthcare sector
患有多动症的成年人的预期寿命会缩短伦敦大学学院研究人员领导的一项世界首例研究发现，被诊断患有注意力缺陷多动障碍（ADHD）的成年人可能比应有的寿命短。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250123/Adults-with-ADHD-found-to-have-reduced-life-expectancy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250123/Adults-with-ADHD-found-to-have-reduced-life-expectancy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9e1f652f-cceb-4c35-b9b9-8c2d9a44728b Thu, 23 Jan 2025 08:24:26 -0500 Adults with ADHD found to have reduced life expectancy
多发性硬化症与围产期精神疾病风险增加有关一项对安大略省超过 890,000 名新生儿进行分析的新研究显示，与其他慢性病患者相比，多发性硬化症 (MS) 患者患围产期精神疾病的风险明显更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250123/Multiple-sclerosis-linked-to-increased-risk-of-perinatal-mental-illness.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250123/Multiple-sclerosis-linked-to-increased-risk-of-perinatal-mental-illness.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f5282840-6b2e-4b67-b9da-20599ab9df00 Thu, 23 Jan 2025 08:15:00 -0500 Multiple sclerosis linked to increased risk of perinatal mental illness
人类DNA重组的完整图谱解开了遗传多样性的秘密deCODE Genetics/Amgen 的科学家们绘制了一张完整的图谱，展示了人类 DNA 在繁殖过程中如何混合。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250123/Complete-map-of- human-DNA-recombination-unlocks-secrets-of-genic-diversity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250123/Complete-map-of- human-DNA-recombination-unlocks-secrets-of-genic-diversity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=48ccdc47-f5b8-4b3a-b2b3-d1beb3aebfd4 Thu, 23 Jan 2025 08:08:29 -0500 Complete map of human DNA recombination unlocks secrets of genetic diversity
新技术在器官发育过程中同时追踪数百万个细胞得益于一项名为 Moscot（“多组学单细胞最佳运输”）的新技术，研究人员现在可以同时观察数百万个细胞发育成新器官（例如胰腺）的过程。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250123/New-technology-tracks-millions-of-cells-simultaneously-during-organ-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250123/New-technology-tracks-millions-of-cells-simultaneously-during-organ-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=18561ee8-7ef7-4d14-afe2-aee4bb8ce0cf Thu, 23 Jan 2025 08:04:28 -0500 New technology tracks millions of cells simultaneously during organ development
研究揭示药物与痴呆症风险的潜在联系大规模审查的结果表明某些药物可能会影响痴呆症风险，为预防和药物再利用策略提供了见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250123/Study-reveals-pottial-drug-links-to-Dementia-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250123/Study-reveals-pottial-drug-links-to-Dementia-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2a87144d-8331-4b44-829c-ee7530a35386 Thu, 23 Jan 2025 07:10:00 -0500 Study reveals potential drug links to Dementia risk
新方法能够利用生物发光蛋白同时进行多色成像用荧光蛋白对活细胞进行成像长期以来一直是了解细胞行为的关键技术。虽然生物发光蛋白比荧光蛋白具有多种优势，但颜色变体的有限可用性使得同时观察多个目标变得困难。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250123/New-method-enables-simultaneous-multi-color-imaging-with-bioluminescent- Proteins.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250123/New-method-enables-simultaneous-multi-color-imaging-with-bioluminescent- Proteins.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bd8a939e-c249-4707-b0a4-ed227624b8e0 Thu, 23 Jan 2025 06:30:52 -0500 New method enables simultaneous multi-color imaging with bioluminescent proteins
特朗普早期的健康举措表明他有意消除拜登的遗产。接下来的事情还不清楚。唐纳德·特朗普总统在医疗保健方面的早期行动表明，他可能打算取消拜登时代的一些计划，以降低药品成本并扩大公共保险计划的覆盖范围。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250123/Trumpe28099s-early-health-moves-signal-intent-to-erase-Bidene28099s-legacy-Whate28099s-next-is-unclear.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250123/Trumpe28099s-early-health-moves-signal-intent-to-erase-Bidene28099s-legacy-Whate28099s-next-is-unclear.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8e740833-2c59-4506-b6d0-2f1669d76794 Thu, 23 Jan 2025 05:57:32 -0500 Trump’s early health moves signal intent to erase Biden’s legacy. What’s next is unclear.
由于各州在移民问题上存在分歧，医院表示不会拒绝患者加州建议医疗保健提供者不要在账单和医疗记录上写下患者的移民身份，并告诉他们不必协助联邦特工进行逮捕。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250123/As-states-diverge-on-immigration-hospitals-say-they-wone28099t-turn-病人-away.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250123/As-states-diverge-on-immigration-hospitals-say-they-wone28099t-turn-病人-away.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f1c2db8d-7aa5-436d-b905-16e4a2c88079 Thu, 23 Jan 2025 05:55:59 -0500 As states diverge on immigration, hospitals say they won’t turn patients away
预康复可以改善手术恢复并减少并发症《英国医学杂志》上发表的一项新研究表明，预康复（也称为 prehab）可能能够减少术后并发症和住院时间，同时还可以提高生活质量和身体恢复。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250123/Prehabilitation-may-improve-surgical-recovery-and-reduce-complications.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250123/Prehabilitation-may-improve-surgical-recovery-and-reduce-complications.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=68827fa9-fb69-4329-9400-a40ce55deb20 Thu, 23 Jan 2025 05:49:30 -0500 Prehabilitation may improve surgical recovery and reduce complications
